about_the_game:
Give your Sims a professional edge with chic and stylish outfits from The Sims 4 Business Chic Kit*. From tailored suits to elegant dresses, Sims will feel confident and fashionable. Complete the look with sleek shoes and fancy accessories for an extra touch of class. The Business Chic Kit ensures Sims always look up to the task. Created by Madlen.

KEY FEATURES
  • Tailored for Success — It's time for your Sims to shine with outfits that showcase their career achievements. Elegant accessories and standout shoes ensure they don't go unnoticed, taking their fashion game to the next level.
detailed_description:
WHAT'S INCLUDED IN THIS PACK


About the Game

Give your Sims a professional edge with chic and stylish outfits from The Sims 4 Business Chic Kit*. From tailored suits to elegant dresses, Sims will feel confident and fashionable. Complete the look with sleek shoes and fancy accessories for an extra touch of class. The Business Chic Kit ensures Sims always look up to the task. Created by Madlen.

KEY FEATURES
  • Tailored for Success — It's time for your Sims to shine with outfits that showcase their career achievements. Elegant accessories and standout shoes ensure they don't go unnoticed, taking their fashion game to the next level.
drm_notice: EA online activation and EA app software installation and background use required.
legal_notice:
*Requires The Sims 4 & all game updates. For PC, see minimum system requirements for the pack.
**Mannequin not included.
